None.flavor: A solid, unbroken coat or scale pattern.

Mottled.flavor: Covered in irregular splotches that break up its outline.

Striped.flavor: Bold vertical stripes, ideal for hiding in tall grass.

Spotted.flavor: Covered in rosette spots to blend with canopy shadows.

Brindled.flavor: Subtle, tiger-like streaks woven through its base color.

Scarred.flavor: Criss-crossed with deep, old battle wounds.

Banded.flavor: Thick, horizontal rings wrapping around its body or limbs.
